name: Repairny (リペアニー)
description:
Let's play with "Repairny" AI robot.



"Repairny" is First-person perspective action game.

Repairny and drones are constantly attacking to player with light sword or laser gun.
Control player direction to guard with player's light sword.
Then attack with your light sword.

Destroy all of enemy in field to clear stage.

3 types of difficulty EASY / NORMAL / HARD (HARD mode will be unlocked if you complete NORMAL mode)
20 stages each mode
limited time is only 120 sec.
It may be a short time stress relief.

- How to Play -

It's simple and easy to play.
This game need mouse controller and space key on keyboard.

Drag scrollbar pointer bottom of window to control player direction.
Guard enemy's attack with your weapon light sword.

After guarded enemy Repairny's attack, Repairny stopped momentary.
It's chance to attack for player.
Press space key to attack.

Destroy all of enemy in limited time and life.
